thread.title: Alan Colmes, Liberal Voice on Fox, Dead at 66 - WSJ

author: Associated Press
title: Alan Colmes, Liberal Voice on Fox, Dead at 66 - WSJ
text:
Alan Colmes, Liberal Voice on Fox, Dead at 66 Co-host of ‘Hannity & Colmes’ was 66 Associated Press Updated Feb. 23, 2017 11:24 a.m. ET 
NEW YORK—Alan Colmes, the radio and television host and commentator best known as the amiable liberal foil to the hard-right Sean Hannity on the Fox News Channel, has died. 
Fox spokeswoman Dana Klinghoffer confirmed his death Thursday. Fox also aired a statement from his family saying that he died Thursday morning after “a brief illness.” Mr.... To Read the Full Story, Subscribe or Sign In Most Popular Videos
